about_the_game:
Have a conversation with a rock in this funny piece of Interactive Fiction.

Key Features:
- Talk to a rock.
- Multiple Choices
- No goals other than the pursuit of good conversation.
- Funny.

What will can you talk to this rock about?:
That’s a good question. 😏

ok but seriously, what can you talk to it about:
That’s a spoiler, but there's 150 choices you can make.

About the author:
Samuel Leigh is a game developer, writer and adjunct professor based in New York.
His work spans from Interactive fiction, to puzzle and action games.
He thought that since this game did well on YouTube one time that he may as well experiment with putting it up on Steam. 🤪

His other game, Moving Jigsaw Puzzles is available on Steam and is also very fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with at least 500MB of memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card or integrated sound chip

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.9
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
